db:info.db:title: Traditional Chinese IME (tcime)
db:info.db:edition: Qt Virtual Keyboard | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Apache License 2.0 and BSD 3-clause "New" or "Revised" License.

db:article.db:para: Traditional Chinese IME (tcime) is an input method engine for traditional Chinese.
Optionally used in Qt Virtual Keyboard.
The sources can be found in qtvirtualkeyboard/src/plugins/tcime/3rdparty/tcime.
